title: Jenny Packham bridal ad font
content:
I adore this font-and I cannot seem to find it anywhere-ideas??

thanks a million!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Swoon.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302015957/http:/typophile.com/files/Swoon.jpg) | 136.51 KB |
author: jessijohn

comments.content: Have you seen it used anywhere else? I think it is custom work. I can't imagine what some letters in a full alphabet of that would look like. I'm a big fan of scripts, both hand-lettered & digital, & I've got to say I find the lack of difference between the letters & the connectors here very wrong.

That's pretty brave for a bridal designer to use such an unorthodox logo. Very 80s metal band.

The dress is nice, but reminds me reminds me of that special sheet used to consumate the marriage in "Like Water for Chocolate"

David
nope, never seen it anywhere else-that is why i was hoping you could help. I agree-I think it is wrong in the bridal dress format-but I love the font none-the-less.
